DOC.brief_summary: Increased physical activity investigator recent study show improve symptom irritable bowel syndrome ( IBS ) . The aim study assess long term effect investigators previous intervention IBS patient improve physical activity . The investigator aim assess long term effect IBS symptom well quality life , fatigue , depression anxiety .

DOC.detailed_description: 86 patient include investigator previous study `` Physical Activity Improves Symptoms Irritable Bowel Syndrome : A Randomized Controlled Trial '' contact ask participate long term follow 5 year previous study . The subject attend one visit underwent bicycle ergometer test calculate oxygen uptake fill questionnaire .
